Class Patient

ruclinic.Person
ruclinic.Patient

public class Patient extends Person
Represents a patient in the clinic with appointment visit information

    • charge

      public int charge()
      Traverses the visits linked list to compute the total charge for the current Patient instance
      Returns:
      Integer containing the total charge of all the visits for this patient

    • isAvailable

      public boolean isAvailable(Date date, Timeslot timeslot)
      Traverses the visits linked list for the current Patient instance it finds if patient is available at a certain timeslot invalid input: '&' date
      Parameters:
      date - Date object to check for availability
      timeslot - Timeslot object to check for availability
      Returns:
      boolean true if patient is available, false otherwise
